p.k: Kirstie Allsopp and furniture maker Anselm Fraser help Jannine and Shaun Cartwright build treasure chests for their young boys' toys
Laura Hamilton house-hunts near Limoges in France with Gary and Maggie from Norfolk. They want a place to retire to that's big enough for all the family

n.u: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

p.n: Find It, Fix It, Flog It II (18)
p.k: Henry Cole finds a treat for restorer Guy, and Simon O'Brien creates stunning table lamps from old theatre lights

n.u: Find It, Fix It, Flog It

p.n: Find It, Fix It, Flog It II (5)
p.k: Henry Cole and Max McMurdo travel the length of Britain looking for items to fix up and flog. In Wales, picks include an oil dispenser, a chaise longue and a catamaran

p.n: Escape to the Chateau: DIY I (4)
p.k: Dick joins the search for a stash of wine said to have been hidden during World War II in Jonathan and Michael's caves. Fiona starts
Alan and Lucy are building an upside-down house in Fife with stunning views of the Forth Bridge. Alan knows what he wants, so what does he make of Charlie
The first visit is to Alston House in Cumbria, where Michael and Carole Allchorne are brimming with confidence. But things get hairy for one guest
The second visit is to Scotia House in Harrogate, where host Marie suspects some of her guests are seeking revenge. Can she impress with deluxe teddy bears
Yvonne hosts at The Canberra Guest House in Blackpool, where relationships are strained and cracks start to show. And one of the guests ruffles more than just feathers
The last visit is to The Crown & Kitchen in East Linton, Scotland, where tensions are close to breaking point. Yvonne and Gail leave no mattress unturned
It's the final day of the competition and tensions run high with allegations of tit-for-tat scoring and a barrage of criticism. The payments are revealed

n.u: The Secret Life of the Zoo

p.n: The Secret Life of the Zoo IV (9)
p.k: Critically endangered rhino Zuri gives birth to baby Ike. Otter Annie has three new pups. Camel Shan-shan is unwell. And sun bears Toni and Millie

p.n: Escape to the Chateau: DIY I (5)
p.k: Jonathan and Michael's latest idea - to keep goats - doesn't go down well with their investors. Philip and Angelina contend with broken toilets at their anniversary party
70% Eddie and Dot dream of a home with a magnificent 360-degree view in Strathbogie Ranges. Can they work around huge granite boulders to achieve their dream?
David and Greta are replacing their house, which they designed and constructed themselves, with a German-built, precision-engineered Huf
75% New: The Same Sky Brand new series: A compelling German drama from Walter Presents set in Berlin in 1974. Lauren is torn between her feelings
Phil, who's 60, is rushed to A&E in a critical condition after falling just two feet off a ladder at work. Violet, who's 93, has fallen and seriously fractured her leg
Corey, who's 27, is rushed to St George's after having a cardiac arrest during a game of ice hockey. His wife of seven days, Alice, was watching
Gordon continues his battle to help turn around Town's Inn in Harpers Ferry, West Virginia. Can he win over the stubborn owner and give the hotel a chance of success?
Phil, who's 60, is rushed to A&E in a critical condition after falling just two feet off a ladder at work. Violet, who's 93, has fallen and seriously fractured her leg
The Supervet An excitable cocker spaniel needs bionic paws. A puppy with a fractured knee must sit still if he's going to get better. And a cat dragging
76% How much prawn is in a prawn cracker? What's in low-salt food instead of salt? Plus: the new high-tech method of keeping fresh herbs alive for longer
